Course Name: ACG 3113 - INTERMEDIATE FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS II
Course Title: INTERMEDIATE FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS II
Course Description: THE SECOND INTERMEDIATE FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS COURSE DEALS WITH A CONTINUATION OF GAAP AND IFRS HARMONIZATION AS APPLIED TO FINANCIAL REPORTING.  AREAS COVERED INCLUDE DEPRECIATION, ACQUISITION AND DISPOSITION OF PROPERTY PLANT AND EQUIPMENT, INTANGIBLES, CURRENT LIABILITIES, STOCKHOLDERS’ EQUITY, EARNINGS PER SHARE. THIS COURSE MUST BE COMPLETED AT HODGES UNIVERSITY.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
